```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Uploading the Data
```{r}
# Upload the toenail df
toenail_df = read.delim("./toenail.txt", header = TRUE, sep = " ", col.names = c("Subject ID", "Response", "Treatment", "Month", "Visit", "X1", "X2", "X3"))

# Clean up toenail_df
toenail_df =
    toenail_df[, 1:5] %>% 
    janitor::clean_names()
```
